original_text: He decided that Christ would die on the cross as a sacrifice. In that way, God would bring all things back to himself. Then everything could live in peace with God. That includes everything on the earth and everything in heaven.
korean_text: 그의 십자가의 피로 화평을 이루사 만물 곧 땅에 있는 것들이나 하늘에 있는 것들이 그로 말미암아 자기와 화목하게 되기를 기뻐하심이라

sentences.original_text: He decided that Christ would die
on the cross as a sacrifice
God would bring all things back to himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 모든 것을 자신에게로 돌이키실 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then everything could live in peace with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 모든 것이 하나님과 화평하게 살 수 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: That includes everything on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 땅 위의 모든 것을 포함한다
